column1: Shanshan Town (simplified Chinese: 杉山镇; traditional Chinese: 杉山鎮; pinyin: Shānshān Zhèn) is a rural town in Louxing District of Loudi City
column3: People's Republic of China. As of the 2015 census it had a population of 43
column4: 200 and an area of 66.38-square-kilometre (25.63 sq mi).

column2: Xiaobi Township was merged into Shanshan Town.

column1: The town is divided into 18 villages and 1 community
The town shares a border with Shijing Town to the west
column3: Hutian Town of Xiangxiang to the northeast
column5: and Lianbin Subdistrict to the south.

column1: Provincial Highway S209 is a north-south highway in the town.
Changsha-Shaoshan-Loudi Expressway passes across the township east to west.
